color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; font-weight: bold !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Vercel
- Frontend Hosting
- Edge Network
- Auto Deploy
- Preview URLs

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; font-weight: bold !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Heroku/Railway
- API Hosting
- Process Mgmt
- Add-ons
- Logs

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; font-weight: bold !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Docker
- WS Container
- Go Binary
- Multi-stage Build
- Health Checks

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; font-weight: bold !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
OAuth Providers
- Google OAuth 2.0
- GitHub OAuth
- OpenID Connect
- Token Exchange
- State Validation

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; font-weight: bold !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Cloudinary CDN
- Profile Pictures
- Image Upload
- Transformations
- Responsive Sizing
- Auto Format

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; font-weight: bold !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Mail Service
- Transactional Emails
- Inbound Webhooks
- Templates
- Bounce Tracking

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; font-weight: bold !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Microsoft Clarity
- Session Recordings
- Heatmaps
- User Analytics
- Performance Insights

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; font-weight: bold !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
MongoDB Atlas
Port 27017
Mongoose ODM • Indexes
Collections: users, workspaces
projects, tasks, members, roles
biometric_sessions
remember_me_sessions

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; font-weight: bold !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Redis Cache
Port 6379
- Query Cache
- Session Store
- Rate Limits
- Presence Data

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; font-weight: bold !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Go WebSocket Server
Port 8001
- Gorilla WebSocket
- JWT Verification
- Workspace Rooms
- Presence Tracking
- Task Events
k6-tested: 10k+ users

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; font-weight: bold !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Server-Sent Events
/api/events
- One-way Updates
- Workspace Scoped
- Event Stream

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; font-weight: bold !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Next.js API Routes
Port 8000
- REST Endpoints • Swagger Docs
- JWT Auth (custom) • OAuth
- Biometrics • Remember Me
- RBAC Middleware • Rate Limit
- SSE (/api/events)

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; font-weight: bold !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Next.js 15 Frontend
Port 3000
- Kanban Board • Calendar • List
- Task Management
- Member Dashboard
- Settings & Profile
State: TanStack Query + Zustand
Web Workers: Background Processing
